Ok so School looks like it's going to turn out very well this quarter I'm taking Sociology and Photoshop (Thank you Kim and Fjord for getting me started with that wonderful book) and Marine Biology which is rather cool because back in the day I wanted to be a Marine Biologist there's just no money in it.But in that class we have 2 awesome trips one to the Everglades where we walk through the swamp to a Gator Hole. and another where we get to Snorkle or scuba dive in Keys at a coral reef. I'm excited about that. 
  So I guess I've got alot on my plate I've got replace my PS3 still I have to get Wacom drawing tablet I've already got the pen but if anyone wants to donate to my schooling cause You can.This is what I need at this site http://intuos.wacom.com/Americas/index.php I will take what ever size you get me. Medium would be nice but I really don't care. I already have the programs I need the only other thing I need is this tablet. My next two couple of quarters will be using this device. and of course when I go out into the world.  If you want to donate to my schooling through pay pal I'll leave a link.  I never realised how much school was going to cost but I'm pulling in the grades even though I think I'm not.  I thought I had failed 2 classes and passed both with B's  and A in my third. so I'm not doing that bad. I've got so much to do, Two Concerts I really want to see and getting myself back on my feet.

Well the this is the ending of eve of a Shitty year and Yet a good year in alot of ways. For all my friends may you have a wonderful new years may you be safe and happy and may you have a as much fun and be around as much love as your hearts and hands can hold. You guys near and far have gotten me through my tough spots yet again. I love you beyond hearts compare. For your inspiration, for your support, wisdom,humor, kindness and the occasional kick in the ass when I need it. I hope that I was there and will continue to be there when you need it.

So in closing I send you the all Good Wisdom and MOJO I can muster to get you through the year. For my Artists, Conquer the minds of the non believers, Give life to any power vision you invoke in any arena. Make their thought tingle and veins want more.For money:Get paper,Make money, Rule the bank,Play lotto, Be giving and kind but don't be stupid, For those that must borrow give back in a timely fashion and if you can't let the person know.

For SEX: fuck like you hate them ( they will love it) suck it like you love it, fuck it like it's the last time every time,If your only gonna do it one time then fuck them within an inch of their life so they remember if forever

For Love; Love hard deep and carefree and don't be afraid of other peoples love for you it can make you stronger. If your curious about their love sample it not ever one has to know about it. wink wink. Love you just as hard as you love others.It's ok to love your guys, It's ok to love your girls.

For Family; You only get one family treat them with love they are your world good bad indifferent they are yours. They in all the glamour and flaws and strength and weakness made you who you are. NOT ALL FAMILY IS BLOOD RELATED we as we live our lives we extend our family to included friends and soul mates. If a friend pisses you off forgive them as much as you can. You chose them to be close to you for a reason and God or the forces of nature will remind you and them why. Let it heal if it is healable.

For freebies:Get promotions and free shit that you want and need;

For Energy Inspire those around you,spread love,Look to the Horizon Follow the instinct of your heart ;
For Low points take no shit, Keep your friends up. and destroy the competition. 
Well that's my Magic,Mojo,Spiritual energy I'm sending out into the world.
Take what you will

You know over the past decade I've watched the world change so drastically. To a now Digital world almost entirely. I'm not a purist I love my digital life. But it just seems like our lives are so contrived now. Music is by song not albums. No one owns anything anymore. Everything is backed up somewhere on a drive that can be lost or stolen. From VHS to DVD now Blue-Ray I love my Blue Ray But I don't want to have to download my movies there is something about the tactile feel of owning an object that it's yours that no one can take from you. That your not subject to renting it. It's like books nothing is better than turning pages or feeling parchment under your finger tips. Now with all theses changes I feel like these corporations that start off with hot young talented people be come money making cash cows only interested in how much money they part me with and less with the quality of their products. I'm not making any money off old videos from my childhood that I saw on MTV that I might want to see again. I just want to feel alive. To see the creative juices when people didn't have big budgets to blow on ever little technological device they could squeeze into a video. Now everything is a copyright infringement or a fucking commercial. 
I think my biggest insult to my sanity it the fact that everytime I watch a fucking a movie I've got to watch a fucking Army commercial or any commercial for that matter. If it's not popcorn or candy or trailers fuck the commercials there is enough product placement in the GOT DAMN Movie as it is. When you can have a entire movie from a persons childhood suddenly become about a car line and they change the whole story to fit the car line well...It's shit like this that kills the holidays for me now. All I can think about is THX 1138 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o_8YJGdyxxE
The top painting is for my portfolio. The next is for a fund raiser for my school scholarship program. If it sells I get half

I'm going through severe depression and hiding it well. I don't want to be touched. I don't want to speak. I don't want to smile. I don't want to be happy. I want silence and to curl up in a fetal position and be warm and cry. I want to be free but maybe I'm just afraid of being alone again. SO SO LONG with out anyone but is it really worth the pain of being alone if your unhappy when your with someone. I mean at least when your with someone your not facing the world all by yourself.

I had a dream in my teens the man I would marry would take a cd player out on the beach and make love to me while Sade's song Mermaid played on repeat. I think at this late date this will always be a fantasy and this free spirit will always be alone. For how can one be free in chains if the person your with is not flying with you. A gilded cage is still a cage. The more I concentrate on me the stronger I get. But I'm still alone. Is this the way it's meant to be?
My head is filled for ideas for paintings I'm just so poor I can't get these thoughts out into the world. Because I don't have the supplies.

It's been a while since I've shared music with folks Meshell Ndegeocello has a new album out. It's called Devil's Halo. Her music always speaks to me on a personal level. It's laid back and smooth like wine or weed. Like if I enjoyed smoking pot I would take a couple of hits and listen to the album. It's Jazzy it's Rock , it's everything you want to hear with out the stuff you don't . Lyrical simplistic flow with a dash of soul. Warm like a bubble bath after a hard day of work. Beer and a sunset. The Ocean and sunset as well. Chill. Vibrations with out a bunch of screaming. Real Music. Throw in the depth of what she is saying and you have something that will get over looked but has more depth than most of the crap out right now. Music that makes you not think I have to like this cause it's popular I like this cause it's music.

I just had my boyfriend take over half the money from my first illustration job (yesterday evening) And all the money from my unemployment (this morning) the latter with out letting me know. With in 24 hrs I went from 1 thousand dollars to 15.00 Who the hell waits all night for someone's money to go into the account and then takes it the minute it's released to the bank. You just got 300.00 yesterday. You don't even fucking ask? That's total bullshit. Your not even looking for work and the illustration job was given to me to help me get some extra money for school to pay for expenses like books. I'm so angry right now.
Far Darker than any of the others but magical just the same.. I loved it. It was the Empire Strikes back of Harry Potter.

Apparently I will not be able to come up to jax to see Harry Potter I have been planning this for months even before I left because this series of movies is very special to me specifically because of the themes of friendship and what those bonds mean. After nearly dying this theme means alot more to me. I made the promise to myself that no matter what happened I would be returning to Jax on Opening night to see the movie with my crew. However circumstances have allowed me to take a trip I would rather not have taken to miss out on one that means the world to me. I am angry. I am done. I am tired and on top of all this I have fucking my first class tomorrow so I'm very pissed right now.. I'm better off single people. Alone and depressed suits me just fine.
And so I've been studying for finals and well I know I'm going to fail algebra I just can't get these concepts. Computer Science having no issue with at all. Should be an A or at least an A-

So I caught the the tail end of an Anime movie I wanted to seeCalled Paprika but the ending song really caught my ear it's called "the Girl in Byakkoya" I don't understand the words at all.but for some reason it makes me feel very happy when I hear it. Lots of soaring vocals. I haven't felt that way about a song i didn't know the words to in a long time.Sometime I don't think it's important to know what  is being said as much as how a song makes you feel.Sometimes I think I'm the only one who feels like I do about ceratin anime.I actually love Satoshi Kons work.

Orientation

 

So it's official I went to school today to go to orientation. I was so nervous and excited but I'm doing it. I can't believe it my first classess are on Tuesday and I'm going for my Bachelors in Illustration. found out that at any point my credit can give me an associates can be in any other field because of the classess I've chosen.So I can graduate with BA in Illustration and an associates in any other field. I'm so excited now if I can just find work down here. I've been running around for the past 2 weeks hardcore looking for work. You know it's bad when McDonalds doesn't call you back. Only in that way do I regret my departure from Comcast. I mean it was paying the bills. But when you start going to work just to interact with other people and pay your bills it's time to find something that you love.

But I'm can't believe I'm actually doing it. I'm so scared and excited is this normal? I actually feel like I belong here at this school. Now I have to get a MAC computer so I can do my assignments for school. Should I ask my sister for help because my parents just don't have it give and I don't want to take any thing away from my nephew. So much all at once can I do it? I'm trying to push the doubts and fear from my head but I'm so excited it's like when I first discovered sex.  I want to do so much. Breathe take it slow....AHHHHHHH I DID IT I"M A STUDENT AND I"M IN SCHOOOL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

This in rssponse to a comment from a friend. It's is to clarify:

 Well my father is only a a year or 2 younger than him. I think   people focus on the fact that he is a war hero..If you wish to call him that far two much. Just because you spent time in a camp doesn't make and expert on the other issues at hand. Its a distraction. And being funny I would have be more impressed had he gotten away. But using thought and reason he was known as the songbird, Of course they offered him up a chance to leave he had already embarassed himself by talking. Now you can look at it one or two other ways. He Knew he would face major shame when returning or he was being slowly brainwashed. 
    Either way Using his service as a term of his expertise in Military affairs bothers me. It's like saying because my sister who is a Dr is an expert on Aids or HIV because I have It. She may have more knowledge than most but it's her field. Also using that example. If my sister votes against Help for HIV patients having the special knowledge she does and having had to deal with it on a personal level. I would be insulted and hurt and be suspect at her thought patterns. If you not finding the thread of commonality let me lead you to it...You spend your time in your career after the war combating the information about that war and other prisoners being released. You vote against our troops being taken care of after sustaining injuries.Sorry I don't buy it. In my humble opinion a heroe is someone who dodged bullets and comes back home and tries to make sure that we don't forget about the others who didn't come back whole or didn't come back at all. Who would make sure that if you have to have bullets whizz past,strike,or fly in your general direction for your country that you deserve your schooling fucking free. You deserve the best care that money can buy if you get hurt at the governments expense. I will pay taxes every day of my life for that. Your doing a job that I either couldn't do, can't do or won't do. That to me would be Heroe.
 
I'm more than unconcerned with the fact that he was given a choice and didn't take it. Call me un American or what ever it takes alot more than that to gain my respect. Now had he come back and fought to make sure these soilders never had to worry about a thing when they come back off a war. That would have garnered my respect. But his failure to do so leaves him an insignificant white haired old man. I have no faith or respect for his service to our country. Because he turned what should have been a lightning bolt of change for his fellow serviceman to visitation and handshakes and posturing for his political career. He should have made his attempt at the Presidency when it meant something. Not years later when he should be retired on a golf course somewhere or a front porch rocking back and forth. Not offering our country to the enemies of the world through the slow ticking of a unsure heart beat and the rambling madness of Beauty contestant Govenor of a state with the 4th smallest population in the USA who belives in faith healing. 

But I guess my veiw of the world is limited an unimportant. Things can't add up to insane to me. Just like Jesse Jackson lost my respect.His fate was sealed when he met my mother and told her what she needed to be doing in her department at Lincoln University.His actions were condesending to a woman who grew up in the time period in which he once mattered.Although being strong. She brushed it off as him being an asshole but I'm quite sure being a child of the civil rights movement it hurt her even if it was brief fleeting moment. But he nailed the coffin in the respect department with his comments about Obama.For there was the same disrespect and disreguard to a second gen child of the civial rights movement proof of follow through character flaw. I don't give my respect to anyone on whim. Colin Powell is a military man I can respect. Your brother in law is a man I can respect. My Father is a man I can respect. All who have taken a term of service for this country.Are there more? your damn right. To me the Uniform is more than just a well laid piece of cloth over a handsome face and body with the proper bulges in the right place.(wink wink). 

Do I like war? fuck no. But I respect that sometimes war is needed. I respect those who serve but just as I don't give a blanket of disdain and hatred to all people I don't give a blanket of respect to everyone who has served in uniform. I know alot a military people who are assholes and probably shouldn't be in a uniform. Perhaps my passion clouds my judgement. Perhaps I don't let all my views seep into every conversation or blog. Maybe my world is a little one sided to your view. Maybe I'm biased and just want the black man to win. But those who know me should know better. They shouldn't just hope to know. They do know my views are not so tunneled visioned and baseless. The Akeim you Know and love is still Akeim. The person you loved when first met me (not with all the drugs) is back. I'm just a little bit more reasonable and able to take on a more mature view of the world having lived in it. 

 We have come a long way and many years from Century 21 Apts. I give you and anyone reading this the power to veto me from life if I stop being a person you love to converse with. If I'm unable to carry on a meaningful conversation at any point in my life. Please make sure that I die. Oops wait somone took care of that already. Ummm..... Well make it quicker than they did. *NOTE* This does not count when drugs or intoxicants are involved. I know some of you sick fucks want to see what I'll leave you in my will.*END NOTE* I love you and didn't mean to make little of the service our loved ones have given or will give.That's not what was intended.

Ingredients:
1/2 dozen red rose buds
1/2 cup of slivered almonds
2 garlic cloves
2 tablespoons of butter
2 tablespoons honey
2 tablespoons cornmeal
2 tablespoons anis

Chop the roses into small pieces and grind in blender with the almonds and garlic. Melt the butter and add honey. Stir the rose, garlic and almond mixture into the honey and butter. Add the cornmeal and anis. The mixture will be a thick paste. Use a spoon to spread onto the chicken. Bake the chicken as usual, basting if the coating gets too dry. The rose petals and anise will infuse the chicken with wonderful flavor.

Use additional rose buds or petals as a garnish when presenting the chicken.

The state of the Union,religious beliefs,entertainment and books. But the more we talk the more I'm throughly convinced the only way this relationship can end is if I fuck it up. Stuffs and happening 
So much is going on right now. I've had to deal with love, parents, death, joy, happiness and being lonely. Along with the other chorus of emotions all at once. I have a man his name is Bill Masters. He is wonderful man. He's older than me but around my older sisters age. So it's not like he's ancient. But he loves me. and he treats me wonderful. He pushes me to succeed helping me through school and other things. I stayed with him the past couple of days and he took me around Ft Lauderdale. We went to the Everglades and to the beach and shopping and he's romantic and a Pisces he's the 12th as you all know I'm the 7th. I get really calm when I'm around him. I can actually think and process information. But I know that I'm loved. And it scares me. For once someone I care about is returning my affection in all the ways that I have shown it to others and it's scary. I'm almost afraid something bad will happen. 

Just so that you all know how serious I am about this man. None of my boyfriends have met my mother or father. Let alone been to my parents house. Hell I can count how many of my friends have been to my parents house. He has been there twice. Once with me and once without and my mother thinks he's wonderful.

So that leads to the next bit. I'm moving away gang. Yes Yes moving away from the ville. I will more than likely be leaving Next January at the latest May 09.Why not sooner you ask ? because I have some personal issues that must be resolved here first. Namely my first semester of school must be completed. Second I'm not moving with out my own car.

Third we must see how things are going. I'm not moving down after knowing someone one for a such a short period of time to find out that we aren't compatiable. Although we are sickenly in love with each other. (When I got on the train to come home I was in tears) I'm in love and happy. Any man who drives 300 miles to and fro with in a 2 week period just to spend a little bit of time with you is a keeper. I feel safe when I'm in his arms. and OH god I sound like a giddy school girl.... Half you are trying not to vomit while reading this and the other half will be trying not to once you see us together.

But I'm ELATED

Kelly's father is in the hospital they are taking him off the machines he is not going to make it. I'm making this post because she can't. I've spent the last 10 minutes crying on the phone.Please send your love and strentgh to Kel I'm in Ft Lauderdale right now but I will be returning as soon as possible

Okay so you haven't been hearing much from me. I went on Tuesday to enroll in College and today I'm filling out the last of  my paper work and trying to get enrolled in the Fall. I'm so nervous. I don't know if I can do it but I'm not really scared I'm excited.Wedneday went to the Dr I'll be released back to work next week I have two ankle braces.Got then new Nin album and HEAD DOWN is my favorite song on the album. Need the Heroes Soundtrack. You guys might want to check out Imogen Heap she is a really great artist.I want to thank the following folks for sticking by me and pointing me in the right direction. 

 Dad and Mom you may never read this but thank you for all your help. Kelly thank you for believing in me always without doubt or compromise.Sketch thanks for slapping me into reality yet supporting my creative fire that goes for you to Robin. Tonya and Angie and Mark and Mike for always being a sounding board when you can keeping me real and sane. Kim and Fjord for carrying me when I couldn't carry myself. Adrian for being you and knowing who I am.Joe for being a rock even when you yourself are in turmoil.

Krystalle for being the guiding light to where You can go when you cut loose. Sandy and Shauna my blood sisters for praying over me and keeping me alive in the hospital. Kerri  and Aubrey and Sarah for never letting me go.Erin for seeing who I was and just accepting that with out conditions.Sylvia and Kirk for still loving me inspite of what's happened to me never treating me differently or judging me not being afraid to touch,hug, kiss,cuddle or show affection. Aaron and Neener for being roles models without knowing it. Jeremy my boss at Starrfucker for giving me second chance to share my twisted view of the world with humour.Xelena for inspiring me on many levels and not even knowing it.

 Even Gary,Steve and Cooper for showing me that love is not halves and to stop accepting half a relationship as a whole.

For anyone not mentioned because you all have piece of my heart in some shape form or fashion. For good or bad you all molded the creature you see before you. But I'm me.

Soon my friends I'm seriously thinking of doing a video blog one because I even though I hate the sound of my voice. I find it alot easier to talk and make my inflections understood through speech rather than writing. I get the feeling that I come off somber and maybe I should try something new and more intresting. Plus I'm want to go through the planning of my comic book and show you guys what I've come up with so let's see where things go.Tell me what you think? Think I should break into video. You know sometimes you forget to thank those you love for things.You forget to say I'm sorry or that your loved.You live in anger and fear and personal solitude because your just trying to make ends meet. Yet you forget about those who have helped you get there.I love Prince so...

Tonya.
  Years of silly jokes and shared moments and personal pain upon each other and our selves. Yet when I think of the sisters that God gave me not by blood but by fate.Your face is the face I see. When we were children giving me ability to not be afraid of myself and understand what I was looking at in the mirror. To love. To love me for all the foolish flaws I had and see that I would out grow some of them and to look past the ones I was still working on.Thank you from the Blood of my heart tainted as it is. Thank you for standing next to me. Pushing me when I couldn't push myself..Letting go to let me grow up and finding me in the dark when it was time to be found.You will always be my Wendy.

Kelly.
  Life Partner is a new meaning when it comes to you. Givig me confidence when I fall the shoulder to lean on when I can't stand on my own.Had I been straight would you have been that wife? Yes. In all you have stayed by me in my  shouting, loss of boyfriends,Dark depression, Heavy joy, Low income, Work, Rest and Play. Health issues. Fear, Creation of ideas, Focus and Rebirth.Thank you Kelly I can't say how thankful I am in a sentence. You just know.You will always be my Lisa as in Wendy and Lisa from Prince..Not that evil bitch we don't mention for fear it may invoke her spirit to appear and bring about the antichrist.

Mark Smith and Micheal Norman 
Yes you both. Who would think that a converstaion would bring friendship like yours. I miss those moments of just talking about any and everything. Coming up with ideas and working on them. Meeting you guys was the best and worst thing for me creatively..Why might you ask? For the rest of my life I will look to be as inspired as I was when we first started talking and then when we lived together. Those were some of the happiest times I've had since I was in Florida. If we didn't have so many people hanging on to all of us at that time I think would all would have published with in a 2 yr period. The future is still there though I look forward to it. No Drama lots of action.

Joe (Butch) Lemeke.
 My Older Brother.My confidant. Through all your steady voice in my head that if I can keep a path I can accomplish anything. Headstrong and stubborn. Yet loving and faithful as a friend.The pinnicale of stick to it. Even when knocked down you get up swinging. You give more than you too will ever know

Adrian.
 There is only one. You may never read this because you don't have a live journal account but I place it anyway. I love you as the twin Brother I wasn't blessed with at Birth, who accepts me beyond color. Beyond everything that moves and shapes the universe. My constant friend. The only male I can trust with everything. Hell the only Male my parents even trust. You are the male friend I never have to worry about a being betrayed if I share my feelings too. You understand comics and great cinema. Most of all you get me. Without having to try. You get into my mind like Kelly does which scares me but I love you Adrian.

Sketch,Robin,Sylvia,Kirk.Kim,Fjord,Angie,Krystalle,You each have kept me safe and sane in ways that most people would be like what the F!
 I thank god for blessing me with friends like you all.
